content.question: Which of the following strategies has most aided the nesting success of the piping plovers at Old Orchard Beach?

choices.label: Moving the fireworks farther away from the nests
Implementation of regulations on fireworks displays on beaches during the holidays
An increase in educational outreach to beachgoers
Implementation of additional taxes on firework purchases

content.answer: An increase in educational outreach to beachgoers

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
